page.title: 08Transport in Barrhead
page.content: Barrhead is only a short journey by {road}from Glasgow and also the towns of the Ayrshire coast.A dual carriage_ way runs through the town.Two bus companies operate in Barrhead_Western SMT and a local family company McGill's.Both companies run buses to Paisley and Glasgow. In 1983 McGills bought an extra long "bendy bus". There is a{rail}service which runs between Barrhead and Glasgow. These are diesel trains. The Glasgow - London train passes through Barrhead. { Air travel}from Barrhead is easy as the town is only fifteen minutes journey by car from Glasgow Airport which has international flight connections.
